curam.util.xml.impl
Class XMLPrintStream

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.xml.impl.XMLPrintStream

public class XMLPrintStream
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for communication with the XML Print Server.

Constructor Detail

XMLPrintStream

public XMLPrintStream(java.lang.String host,
                      int port)
Construct an XML Print Stream instance using the host name and port provided. The host and port provided as parameters here will always be overridden by the host and port specified in the open method or alternatively by the host and port configured in the application configuration file.

Parameters:
host - The name of the host of which the XML Server resides
port - The port on which the XML Server is listening

XMLPrintStream

public XMLPrintStream(XMLServerEndPoint[] endpoints)
Construct an XML Print Stream instance using a list of endpoints. The host and port provided as parameters here will always be overridden by the host and port specified in the open method or alternatively by the host and port configured in the application configuration file.

Parameters:
endpoints - The endpoints for the XML servers

XMLPrintStream

public XMLPrintStream()
Construct an XML Print Stream instance.

setEncoding

public void setEncoding(java.lang.String encoding)
Set the protocol encoding. If the encoding is not supported by the JVM, then an error will be thrown to this effect.

Parameters:
encoding - The protocol encoding.
See Also:
XMLPrintStream.getEncoding()

getEncoding

public java.lang.String getEncoding()
Gets the encoding that will be used for printing within the XMLServer. This encoding may be set using the XMLPrintStream.setEncoding() method. If the encoding has not been set, then the value of the curam.xmlserver.fileencoding property will be used. If this property has not been set, then the default encoding of UTF-8 will be returned.

Returns:
encoding The encoding.
See Also:
XMLPrintStream.setEncoding(java.lang.String)

setPreviewStream

public void setPreviewStream(java.io.OutputStream preview)
Setting the preview stream will cause the PDF data to be written to the specified stream rather than be sent to the printer (or whatever the XML server has been configured to do with it).

Use an OutputStream to capture the PDF in a string if it is to be returned to the client application. The stream should be opened before passing it in and will not be closed by the PrintStream.

Parameters:
preview - The specified output stream

open

public void open(XSLTemplateInstanceKey key)
          throws AppException,
                 InformationalException
Make a connection to the print engine and send the configuration and template information in readiness for the streamed data. The host name and port number are read from the application configuration file, if they are set in the application configuration file. If the application configuration file does not contain the host name or port number, then the default host name(127.0.0.1) and default port number(1800) are used.

Parameters:
key - A templateID, template locale and a template version so the template can be obtained from the database.
Throws:
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_BAD_RESPONSE - An unexpected response was received when communicating with the XMLServer.
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_TEMPLATE_RNF - Could not find the specified template.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

open

public void open(java.lang.String xslTemplate)
          throws AppException,
                 InformationalException
Make a connection to the print engine and send the configuration and template information in readiness for the streamed data. The host name and port number are read from the application configuration file, if they are set in the application configuration file. If the application configuration file does not contain the host name or port number, then the default host name(127.0.0.1) and default port number(1800) are used.

Parameters:
xslTemplate - The template information to be sent to the database.
Throws:
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_BAD_RESPONSE - An unexpected response was received when communicating with the XMLServer.
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_TEMPLATE_RNF - Could not find the specified template.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                 int port)
          throws AppException,
                 InformationalException
Make a connection to the print engine and send the configuration and template information in readiness for the streamed data.

Parameters:
key - A templateID, template locale and a template version so the template can be obtained from the database.
host - The host name of the XML Server
port - The port on which the XML Server resides
Throws:
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_BAD_RESPONSE - An unexpected response was received when communicating with the XMLServer.
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_TEMPLATE_RNF - Could not find the specified template.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

open

public void open(XSLTemplateInstanceKey key,
                 XMLServerEndPoint[] endpoints)
          throws AppException,
                 InformationalException
Make a connection to the print engine and send the configuration and template information in readiness for the streamed data.

Parameters:
key - A templateID, template locale and a template version so the template can be obtained from the database.
endpoints - The list of XML server endpoints
Throws:
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_BAD_RESPONSE - An unexpected response was received when communicating with the XMLServer.
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_TEMPLATE_RNF - Could not find the specified template.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getStream

public java.io.OutputStream getStream()
Obtain the steam that is used for XML Server communication.

Returns:
The stream that should be used for communication

close

public void close()
           throws AppException
Closes the connection to the print engine and allows printing to commence.

Throws:
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_BAD_RESPONSE - An unexpected response was received when communicating with the XMLServer.
AppException - ERR_PRINT_STREAM_NO_RESPONSE - Could not communicate with the XMLServer to close the dialog.
